item.title: 可可期货上涨，供应担忧再成焦点
item.description: 可可价格上涨，是因为人们再次担心供应短缺问题，而供应短缺曾在 4 月份将价格推至历史最高点。【原文：Cocoa rose amid renewed concerns over the supply shortages that pushed prices to all-time highs in April.】

item.title: 比特币矿工 Core 拒绝人工智能公司 CoreWeave 的 10 亿美元收购要约
item.description: 比特币矿机制造商Core Scientific公司拒绝了人工智能初创公司CoreWeave公司主动提出的10亿美元收购要约，而就在几天前，这两家公司刚刚宣布建立合作伙伴关系，预计将产生约35亿美元的收入。【原文：Bitcoin miner Core Scientific Inc. has rejected an unsolicited $1 billion takeover offer from artificial intelligence startup CoreWeave Inc., just days after the companies announced a partnership that they projected would generate about $3.5 billion in revenue.】

item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The stock market’s strength in the first half of 2024 is on track to carry on into the remaining months of the year — and expand into quieter corners of the market, according to Citigroup Inc.’s global wealth management business.】

item.title: 高利率使私募股权公司与直接借贷者对立
item.description: Tikehau Capital 私募债务主管 Cecile Mayer-Levi 在接受彭博电视采访时说，高利率环境正在造成私募股权投资和私人信贷借贷机构之间的紧张关系，因为它们的投资组合面临压力。【原文：The high interest rate environment is creating tension between private equity and private credit lenders as their portfolios come under pressure, Tikehau Capital’s Head of Private Debt Cecile Mayer-Levi, said in an interview with Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息具有里程碑意义，但下一步行动信号寥寥
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）宣布了其数月来一直标榜的降息措施，即从创纪录的高点上移开，但并未表示接下来可能会有更多的降息措施。【原文：The European Central Bank delivered the interest-rate reduction it’s been flagging for months — moving away from a record high — but stopped short of indicating more may follow.】

item.title: 俄罗斯物价上涨，政策紧缩，加息犹如抛硬币
item.description: 俄罗斯央行将在周五举行的利率制定会议上面临借贷成本的艰难抉择，因为该国的乌克兰战争继续使经济过热并刺激物价加速增长。【原文：Russia’s central bank is facing a tough choice on borrowing costs at its rate-setting meeting on Friday, as the country’s war in Ukraine continues to overheat the economy and stoke an acceleration in price growth.】

item.title: 英国住宅建筑商关注降息和工党可能获胜带来的经济复苏
item.description: 随着下调利率的前景以及未来工党政府可能出台新的住房政策，英国住宅建筑商正逐步走向复苏。【原文：UK homebuilders are inching closer toward recovery as the prospect of rate cuts and the possibility of new housing policies under a future Labour government come into sharper focus.】

item.title: 据说阿美石油公司 120 亿美元的报价将吸引国外的强烈需求
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，外国投资者纷纷涌入沙特阿美公司价值 120 亿美元的股票出售活动，这标志着该石油巨头 2019 年的上市活动出现了转机，因为该上市活动最终主要是在当地进行。【原文：Foreign investors have flocked to Saudi Aramco’s $12 billion share sale, people familiar with the matter said, marking a turnaround from the oil giant’s 2019 listing that ended up as a largely local affair.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在上一交易日科技股大涨将英伟达（Nvidia）的市值推高至超过 3 万亿美元之后，今早的股票期货稍事喘息。现在的焦点转向欧洲央行首次降息预期，以及美国申请失业救济人数数据。 莫文娜-科尼亚姆【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are taking a breather this morning after a tech-fueled surge in the previous session propelled Nvidia’s market value to over $3 trillion. item.title: 岸田 350 亿美元大手笔不可能为大选铺平道路
item.description: 日本首相岸田文雄（Fumio Kishida）计划通过一次性退税来支持 350 亿美元的计划，但在 9 月份的党内领导选举之前，这一计划似乎既不可能引发消费支出的强劲复苏，也不可能使他的民意调查支持率大幅上升。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida’s $35 billion plan to shore up support with a one-time tax rebate looks unlikely to spark either a strong resurgence of consumer spending or a jump in his opinion poll ratings ahead of a September party leadership election.】

item.title: DC 咨询公司称，私人信贷推动了意大利并购案的增长
item.description: 根据投资银行 DC Advisory 的一份报告，随着正在筹备中的交易取得成果以及意大利经济状况的改善，意大利的并购活动有望在今年晚些时候到 2025 年期间回暖。【原文：M&A activity in Italy is poised to pick up later this year into 2025, as deals in the pipeline come to fruition and the country’s economic conditions improve, according to a report by investment bank DC Advisory.】

item.title: Advent认为收购公司面临快速返还现金的压力
item.description: 据 Advent International 的 Johanna Barr 称，私募股权投资者希望该行业寻求更多的退出，以便 "尽早 "收回资金。【原文：Private equity investors want the industry to pursue more exits in order to get their money back “sooner rather than later,” according to Advent International’s Johanna Barr.】

item.title: 在战区运营的黎巴嫩航空公司努力维持飞行
item.description: 黎巴嫩国家航空公司对在冲突地区运营并不陌生。早在 2006 年，以色列的一次空袭摧毁了贝鲁特-拉菲克-哈里里国际机场的跑道，严重影响了该航空公司的运营。【原文：Lebanon’s national carrier is no stranger to operating in a conflict zone. Back in 2006, an Israeli air strike destroyed the runways of Beirut–Rafic Hariri International Airport, severely curtailing the carrier’s operations.】

item.title: EFG 国际集团股价因瑞士宝盛交易猜测而上涨
item.description: 一则报道指出，市场猜测瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）可能很快宣布收购 EFG 国际股份公司（EFG International AG）。【原文：EFG International AG shares spiked after a report noted market speculation that Julius Baer Group Ltd. may soon announce a takeover of its rival.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将预算赤字目标降至2015年以来最低水平
item.description: 随着谢赫-哈西娜（Sheikh Hasina）总理领导的政府在外汇储备不断减少的情况下放缓开支并提高税收，孟加拉国计划将预算赤字削减到十多年来的最低水平。【原文：Bangladesh plans to cut the budget deficit to the lowest in more than a decade as Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina’s government slows spending and raises taxes amid a steady erosion of foreign reserves.】

item.title: 瑞士能源交易商 MET 寻求收购立陶宛 Achema 54% 的股份
item.description: 瑞士能源贸易商和生产商 MET 集团计划收购立陶宛化肥生产商 Achema 集团的大部分股份，该集团是波罗的海国家最大的公司之一。【原文：Swiss energy trader and producer MET Group plans to buy a majority stake in Lithuanian fertilizer producer Achema Group, one of the Baltic nation’s biggest companies.】

item.title: 南非经常账户差额缩小幅度超过预期
item.description: 由于出口略有增长，而进口因需求下降而减少，南非第一季度经常账户赤字的收窄幅度超出预期。【原文：South Africa’s current-account shortfall narrowed more than expected in the first quarter as exports increased marginally and imports decreased due to lower demand.】

item.title: 交易激增，美国银行能源银行家迁往迪拜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着中东能源行业交易的蓬勃发展，美国银行公司的一位高级交易员将从伦敦调往迪拜。【原文：A senior Bank of America Corp. dealmaker is relocating from London to Dubai, according to people familiar with the matter, as transactions in the Middle Eastern energy industry boom.】

item.title: 小管道裂缝如何引发欧洲天然气市场恐慌
item.description: 挪威正在对一个天然气平台上的管道进行紧急维修，但这一事件严峻地提醒人们，小规模的故障也可能导致欧洲物价飞涨。【原文：Urgent repairs to a pipe on a gas platform in Norway are underway but the event served as a grim reminder that small outages can send European prices soaring.】

item.title: 英国电网预计冬季电力供应充足，但风险依然存在
item.description: 今年冬天，英国电网可能会有更大的缓冲空间来防范潜在的电力短缺，从而减少对备用电力供应的需求，帮助维持电力供应。【原文：The UK’s power grid will likely have a bigger buffer to guard against potential shortages this winter, reducing the need for backup supplies to help keep the lights on.】

item.title: 英国监管机构的汽车贷款审查使 S&U 贷款公司利润微薄
item.description: 英国汽车贷款公司 S&U Plc 公布第一季度盈利下滑，因为该国金融监管机构的审查继续对收款造成压力。该股盘中跌幅创四个月来最大。【原文：UK motor lender S&U Plc reported a slump in first-quarter earnings, as a review by the country’s financial regulator continues to weigh on collections. The shares had their biggest intraday decline in four months.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"成员国部长拒绝对石油增产作出消极反应
item.description: 欧佩克+"成员国的部长们拒绝了原油市场对欧佩克决定从 10 月份起逐步提高原油产量的看跌反应，并预测市场最终将看到该组织的政策是正确的。【原文：OPEC+ ministers rejected oil’s bearish reaction to its decision to gradually boost crude production from October and predicted the market will eventually see that the group’s policy is correct.】
